There is nothing that bears comparison with the aim and purpose of Christian instrumentalities laboring for the salvation of souls. At the 


                                     -38- 

time of baptism in the name of the Father, the Son, and the Holy Ghost, the will, the purpose, the inclination is pledged that the whole life--body, mind, and soul--shall be dead to the world and to all selfishness, and shall become subordinate to the will of God.
